original: unfold is_linear. split. - intros x y. unfold zero. rewrite AbelianGroup.plus_zero. rewrite AbelianGroup.plus_zero. reflexivity. - intros k x. unfold zero. rewrite AbelianGroup.scal_zero. reflexivity. - exists 0. split. + apply Rlt_0_1. + intros x. unfold zero. rewrite AbelianGroup.scal_zero. apply Rmult_0_l.
